extendedInfo.description: Itâs 50 BC and the whole of Gaul is occupied by the Romansâ¦ The whole of it? Not quite! A village inhabited by indomitable Gauls still continues to and always will resist the invader.MEGAPUNCHOne swallow of magic potion and throw your roman away as far as possible.THEYâRE CRAZY THESE ROMANSUnlock more than 20 objects (helmet, cloak, helium, etc.) and characters (Obelix, Dogmatix and other legionaries) which will help send your Roman further and further away.THE WORLD OF ASTERIXTravel through the most emblematic countries from the adventures of Asterix, from the Gaul village to Egypt via the Compendium Roman camp, Lutetia and, of course, Romeâ¦and not forgetting the pirates, by Jove!SIMPLE AND FUNAsterix Megapunch is intended for Gauls of all ages. Fire up Asterixâs fist by twirling your finger before aiming it at your Roman to send him flying straightaway.COLLECT THE ASTERIX CHARACTERSCollect the 30 Asterix character cards by picking them up during the levels or swapping them with your friends. Caesar will be happy to tell you their story.CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDSTake on your friends. Their records are depicted as Romans inflated with helium that you will encounter on your journey.

reviews.title: Please fix this!!
reviews.comment: So sad, I don\'t even get to play the game. :(  I was really looking forward to it. When I open the game all I get is a black screen with music\302\277 Then it force closes... Can you please look into this; I would love to be able to play this game.  Samsung Galaxy S Fascinate
reviews.author: Kia bia lan

reviews.title: Not bad, but could be better
Good, but buggy
reviews.comment: After playing the game for a week, I can say that it\'s good. But the fact that the game closes while playing really ruines the experience. Half of the time the game closes while the roman still hadn\'t landed. please fix this!
reviews.author: Kevin Desloovere

reviews.title: hilariously fun game
reviews.comment: Love the game, simple and yet addictive.
reviews.author: Indra Tjahyana

reviews.title: Interesting but..
reviews.comment: Realy bad pop effect when domain falling from the sky. ... just for this annoying fact ill like the money back... then too long banner for score... really long before you can hit an others domain.... the interaction for hitting the domain.....turn turn turn .... bad choice.
reviews.author: Jacques Deschambeault

reviews.title: Pretty nice
reviews.comment: But the game crashes when I go above the sea On my friends iPad there\'s no problem. I have a transformer from Asus. Please fix the bug so I can play on. Its sad that you have to pay for a game and then doesn\'t work properly!!
reviews.author: Mark ie

reviews.title: Fun at first
reviews.comment: After a few levels and powerups you can fly for as long as you have time for... My last play i could go on for ever with the owl, lighnings and fishes.. which killed the fun
reviews.author: Gustav Stening

reviews.comment: Could you make it easier to throw the punch
reviews.author: Abel de la Torre

reviews.title: Make more locations or maps!
reviews.comment: Awesome game needs more  perks and maps!
reviews.author: Carl Ceppi

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love it, although I wish it allowed to sign in with your g+ account and had Google play achievements
reviews.author: Majdi Jarrar
